verbs.description: Perhaps [ARG1: Trump lawyer Emmet Flood] [V: showing] up [ARGM-LOC: to the closed - door meeting of the House Intelligence Committee] was the last straw for Congressman Adam Schiff who said that Flood , “ had no business being there . ” That was n’t all he said .
